text: Poistine, Allakh kupil u veruyushchikh ikh dushi i ikh dostoyaniye za to, chto im - ray! Oni srazhayutsya na puti Allakha, ubivayut i byvayut ubity, soglasno obeshchaniyu ot Nego istinnomu v Tore, Yevangelii i Korane. Kto zhe boleye veren v svoyem zavete, chem Allakh? Raduytes' zhe svoyey torgovle, kotoruyu vy zaklyuchili s Nim! Eto ved' - velikiy uspekh
